game: Super Smash Bros. (WiiU)
+-- folder: Stats Codes
    type: Slider
    address: 
    +-- cheat: Attack
        address: 0xec
    +-- cheat: Defense
        address: 0xee
    +-- cheat: Speed
        address: 0xf0
+-- folder: Random Cash & Items
    type: Random
    address: 
    +-- cheat: Random Cash & Items
        address: 0x174
+-- folder: Level Codes
    type: SliderVals
    address: 
    +-- cheat: Level
        address: 0x158
+-- folder: Appearance Codes
    type: Slider
    address: 
    +-- cheat: Appearance
        address: 0xe4
+-- folder: Special Moves
    type: Slider
    address: 
    +-- cheat: Standard
        address: 0xe5
    +-- cheat: Side
        address: 0xe6
    +-- cheat: Up
        address: 0xe7
    +-- cheat: Down
        address: 0xe8

    address:
